mapper.select: select roles.id, roles.name, roles.code, code.name as codeName, roles.type, type.name as typeName from sys_users sys_user join sys_user_in_role uir on sys_user.id = uir.user_id and uir.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.id = #{userId} join sys_roles roles on uir.role_id = roles.id and roles.is_deleted = 0 and roles.is_locked = 0 left join sys_code code on roles.code = code.value and code.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_code type on roles.type = type.value and type.is_deleted = 0

select org.id, org.code, org.name, org.orgClass, org.orgClassName, org.is_platform, org.belong_to_org, org.is_locked, org.is_deleted, org.parent_id, org.parent_code, org.is_charter, org.withdrawal, org.discount, d.defaultDiscount, d.defaultWithdrawal from (select so.id, so.code, so.name, oei.organization_class orgClass, sc.name orgClassName, oei.is_platform, oei.belong_to_org, so.parent_id, so.parent_code, oei.is_charter, oei.withdrawal, oei.discount, so.is_locked, so.is_deleted
from sys_organizations so join organization_extra_info oei on oei.is_deleted = 0 and so.id = oei.organization_id join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on mieiuio.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 and mieiuio.organization_id = so.id left join sys_code sc on sc.is_deleted = 0 and oei.organization_class = sc.value ) org, (select discount defaultDiscount, (case when is_deleted = 0 then 1 else 0 end) defaultWithdrawal from withdrawal_default_discount where is_company = 1) d
where org.is_deleted = 0 and org.is_locked = 0

select count(so.id) from sys_organizations so join organization_extra_info oei on oei.is_platform = 0 and oei.is_deleted = 0 and so.id = oei.organization_id join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on mieiuio.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 where so.is_deleted = 0 and so.code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and so.is_locked = 0

select count(mieiuio.id) from member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio join organization_extra_info oei on oei.organization_id = mieiuio.organization_id and oei.is_deleted = 0 and oei.is_platform = 0 where mieiuio.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0

select ei.id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_code, ei.employee_note_name, ei.employee_class, sc.name employeeClassName, ei.avatar from employee_info ei join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on mieiuio.employee_id = ei.id and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 and mieiuio.user_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join sys_code sc on sc.value = ei.employee_class and sc.is_deleted = 0 where ei.is_deleted = 0

select T2.id from (select @r as _id, (select @r := parent_id from sys_organizations where id = _id) as 2v2, @l := @l + 1 as lvl from (select @r := #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},@l :=0) vars, sys_organizations h where @r is not null) T1 left join sys_organizations T2 on T1._id = T2.id where T2.parent_id is null
